text: Circle of Friends is a 1995 Irish British American drama movie directed by Pat O'Connor and was based on the 1990 novel of the same name by Maeve Binchy. It stars Chris O'Donnell, Minnie Driver, Geraldine O'Rawe, Saffron Burrows, Colin Firth, Alan Cumming and was a box office success. == Other websites == * * * * * Category:1995 drama movies Category:Irish drama movies Category:British drama movies Category:American drama movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by Pat O'Connor
title: Circle of Friends (1995 movie)
